wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Taylor (born 26 November 1974 in Glasgow) is a Scottish professional football former player and coach, who is currently the head coach of Hamilton Academical. Taylor played for several clubs in Scotland, and Drogheda United in Ireland, between 1992 and 2009. He then became a coach, and was manager of League of Ireland side Limerick. He was appointed head coach of Hamilton Academical in August 2021.

response: Stuart Taylor has been manager since August 2021.
